allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement complete transferee management system with registrar dashboard integration

Features:
- Create comprehensive transferee enrollment workflow (5-stage: pending input â†’ TOR verification â†’ account creation â†’ enrolled â†’ rejected)
- Build registrar-restricted UI for transferee management (role_required decorators on all views)
- Add 4 new templates for transferee management (list, create, detail, account details)
- Integrate transferee stats and quick action button into registrar dashboard
- Implement student ID generation (6-digit sequential format starting 100001)
- Add student account settings page (change username/password with password verification)
- Update URL structure to /enrollment/registrar/transferee/ (registrar-only access)
- Add secure password generation for transferees (12-char mixed case with symbols)
- Implement transaction-safe account creation with credential display in session

Models:
- Add student_id field to Student model
- Create TransfereeEnrollment model with 5-stage workflow states
- Create TransfereeCredit model for TOR subject mapping with inline admin editing

Admin Interface:
- Add TransfereeCreditInline for managing credits within transferee detail
- Register TransfereeEnrollmentAdmin with organized fieldsets and delete permissions
- Register TransfereeCreditAdmin for credit management

Registrar Dashboard:
- Add 2 stat cards: Pending Transferees (yellow), Ready to Create Account (green)
- Add Transferee Management quick action button
- Both stats link to transferee management with appropriate filters

Account Management:
- Add account_settings view for students to change username and password
- Implement comprehensive validation for username changes (length, duplicates, password verification)
- Implement comprehensive validation for password changes (current verification, strength, confirmation)
- Update session auth hash after password change to keep user logged in
- Add Account Settings link in user dropdown menu for students

Audit Trail:
- Log all transferee creation, TOR verification, account creation, and rejection actions
- Log username and password change actions with audit trail
